name: lets-engage-app
description: ![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1*XEu9XT-U1RKmuTtz8k3qMQ.png) This is a group video chat web app that uses [Agora.io](https://www.agora.io) to build a simple group video chat web app, very similar to Google Hangouts, Skype or whichever other video chat platform you prefer.
